text: Melanie Ann Stansbury (born January 31, 1979) is an American scientist and politician. She is the U.S. Representative for New Mexico's 1st congressional district since 2021. Stansbury was a member of the New Mexico House of Representatives for the 28th district from 2019 until 2021. Stansbury is a member of the Democratic Party. ==References== Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from New Mexico Category:Members of the New Mexico Legislature Category:Politicians from Albuquerque, New Mexico Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Scientists from New Mexico
title: Melanie Stansbury
